title: Parent-Child Relationships to Children
description: How to get list of parent-child relationships to children of a person.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<fs:familysearch xmlns:gx="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="person" title="Person"/>
    <gx:relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/ParentChild" id="FPPP0-PP0">
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP3" rel="child" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="father" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="parent" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="person1" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP3" rel="person2" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/parent-child-relationships/PPP0-PP0" rel="relationship" title="Parent-Child Relationship"/>
        <gx:identifier type="http://familysearch.org/v1/ChildAndParentsRelationship">https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPP0-PP0</gx:identifier>
        <gx:person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" resourceId="PPP0-PP1"/>
        <gx:person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP3" resourceId="PPP0-PP3"/>
    </gx:relationship>
    <gx:relationship type="http://gedcomx.org/ParentChild" id="FPPP1-PP0">
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP1-PP3" rel="child" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="father" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="parent" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" rel="person1" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP1-PP3" rel="person2" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/parent-child-relationships/PPP1-PP0" rel="relationship" title="Parent-Child Relationship"/>
        <gx:identifier type="http://familysearch.org/v1/ChildAndParentsRelationship">https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPP1-PP0</gx:identifier>
        <gx:person1 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP0-PP1" resourceId="PPP0-PP1"/>
        <gx:person2 resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPP1-PP3" resourceId="PPP1-PP3"/>
    </gx:relationship>
</fs:familysearch>
